name: Jumperbird
description:
We must reach the highest score by passing through between boxes with our little bird.
You have to go through the space between the boxes.
By using the spacebar, you enable your bird to move up.
When you don't press the spacebar, your bird starts to go down.
Measure how good your reflexes and visual attention are!

Features:

Endless Level
Simple Gameplay
Simple Graphic
